name: Attila Csihar
description:
'''Attila Gábor Csihar''' ({{IPA|hu|ˈɒtillɒ ˈt͡ʃihɒr|lang}}; born 29 March 1971), also sometimes known as '''Void''', is a Hungarian [[extreme metal]] vocalist, best known for his vocal work in Norwegian [[black metal]] band [[Mayhem (band)|Mayhem]] and American [[drone metal]] band [[Sunn O)))]]. Author [[Ian Christe]] describes his vocals as "[[Opera#Operatic voices|operatic]]".
{{TOC limit|2}}
